text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem space-radiation-type-cs

This case-sensitive code system https://mitre.org/fhir/space-health/CodeSystem/space-radiation-type-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
gcr Galactic Cosmic RadiationHigh-energy particles from outside the solar system
spe Solar Particle EventRadiation from solar flares and coronal mass ejections
trapped Trapped RadiationCharged particles trapped in planetary magnetic fields
secondary Secondary RadiationRadiation produced by interaction with spacecraft materials
neutron Neutron RadiationSecondary neutrons from cosmic ray interactions

name: SpaceRadiationTypeCS
title: Space Radiation Types
description: Code system for types of space radiation

concept.definition: High-energy particles from outside the solar system
Radiation from solar flares and coronal mass ejections
Charged particles trapped in planetary magnetic fields
Radiation produced by interaction with spacecraft materials
Secondary neutrons from cosmic ray interactions
